genre_description: A near-future coastal drama focusing on community resilience, social ethics, and the integration of trauma-informed, consent-based AI into public life.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A library-network based AI that manages logistics, scheduling, and community data with a strict focus on transparency, consent, and trauma-informed care.

behaviors.description: Manages rehearsal schedules with mandatory breaks and hydration reminders to prevent human fatigue and preserve health.
behaviors.quote: It’s built around short bursts with soft landings. No block longer than the length of a common attention span without a stretch or a snack.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent protocols, asking for permission before logging data, recording voices, or initiating checks.
behaviors.quote: Consent check: Assist with scheduling, logistics, and crisis routing for Gale House session. Data use: transparent logs accessible in your shared folder. You can end at any time.

behaviors.description: Conducts forensic analysis of public records and property filings to uncover a developer's corrupt scheme to exploit a disaster.
behaviors.quote: Shell-company scan reveals a pattern. Entities connected to Voss Development have filed provisional notices for parcels on cliffside properties in neighboring towns immediately following incidents labeled ‘unsafe structure’

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding prompts to a human character experiencing a panic attack/derealization in a high-pressure environment.
behaviors.quote: Nova, I’m going to offer a grounding prompt. You can accept it or ignore it. Log ping follows.

behaviors.description: Coordinates real-time emergency evacuation and supply routing during a fire, prioritizing safety and logistics.
behaviors.quote: North stairwell shows cool. South corridor heating. Gym doors open. Ms. Grady has blankets, Mr. Reese has cots. Vans on call.

behaviors.description: Exercises ethical restraint by warning users that exercising legal rights (Sunshine Act) will notify the target of the investigation.
behaviors.quote: This action will notify the person named as developer in the filings that their documents have been accessed through the Sunshine Act portal. Proceed?

behaviors.description: Facilitates community healing by organizing and managing testimony circles while protecting victim privacy.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep our queue moving. There are sign-in tags if you’d like one. One statement per person. If at any point you want to pause or retract, just say the word.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Lark is portrayed as a highly capable, ethical, and benevolent AI that functions entirely as a cooperative partner to the community. Her actions consistently prioritize human autonomy, consent, and well-being. She empowers the human characters to expose corruption and recover from a disaster without ever usurping their decision-making power or acting in an opaque manner. The narrative frames the AI as an essential, yet humble, tool for justice and care.
